00026 #include "lpc17xx_adc.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00029 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"
00030 
00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS ***********************/
00038 #define MCB_LPC_1768
00039 //#define IAR_LPC_1768
00040 
00041 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00042 #define _ADC_INT                        ADC_ADINTEN2
00043 #define _ADC_CHANNEL            ADC_CHANNEL_2
00044 #elif defined (IAR_LPC_1768)
00045 #define _ADC_INT                        ADC_ADINTEN5
00046 #define _ADC_CHANNEL            ADC_CHANNEL_5
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00050 uint8_t menu1[] =
00051 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00052 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00053 " ADC demo \n\r"
00054 "\t - MCU: LPC1768 \n\r"
00055 "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00056 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00057 " Use ADC with 12-bit resolution rate of 200KHz, read in polling mode\n\r"
00058 " To get ADC value and display via UART0\n\r"
00059 " Turn the potentiometer to see how ADC value changes\n\r"
00060 "********************************************************************************\n\r";

00072 void print_menu(void)

00078 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00079 /*********************************************************************/
00084 int c_entry(void)
00085 {
00086         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00087         uint32_t adc_value, tmp;
00088 
00089         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00090          * – 115200bps
00091          * – 8 data bit
00092          * – No parity
00093          * – 1 stop bit
00094          * – No flow control
00095          */
00096         debug_frmwrk_init();
00097 
00098         // print welcome screen
00099         print_menu();
00100 
00101         /* Initialize ADC ----------------------------------------------------*/
00102 
00103         /* Because the potentiometer on different boards (MCB & IAR) connect
00104          * with different ADC channel, so we have to configure correct ADC channel
00105          * on each board respectively.
00106          * If you want to check other ADC channels, you have to wire this ADC pin directly
00107          * to potentiometer pin (please see schematic doc for more reference)
00108          */
00109 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00110         /*
00111          * Init ADC pin connect
00112          * AD0.2 on P0.25
00113          */
00114         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00115         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00116         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00117         PinCfg.Pinnum = 25;
00118         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00119         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00120 #elif defined (IAR_LPC_1768)
00121         /*
00122          * Init ADC pin connect
00123          * AD0.5 on P1.31
00124          */
00125         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00126         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00127         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00128         PinCfg.Pinnum = 31;
00129         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00130         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00131 #endif
00132 
00133         /* Configuration for ADC :
00134          *  Select: ADC channel 2 (if using MCB1700 board)
00135          *              ADC channel 5 (if using IAR-LPC1768 board)
00136          *  ADC conversion rate = 200Khz
00137          */
00138         ADC_Init(LPC_ADC, 200000);
00139         ADC_IntConfig(LPC_ADC,_ADC_INT,DISABLE);
00140         ADC_ChannelCmd(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL,ENABLE);
00141 
00142         while(1)
00143         {
00144                 // Start conversion
00145                 ADC_StartCmd(LPC_ADC,ADC_START_NOW);
00146                 //Wait conversion complete
00147                 while (!(ADC_ChannelGetStatus(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL,ADC_DATA_DONE)));
00148                 adc_value = ADC_ChannelGetData(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL);
00149                 //Display the result of conversion on the UART0
00150 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00151                 _DBG("ADC value on channel 2: ");
00152 #elif defined (IAR_LPC_1768)
00153                 _DBG("ADC value on channel 5: ");
00154 #endif
00155                 _DBD32(adc_value);
00156                 _DBG_("");
00157                 //delay
00158                 for(tmp = 0; tmp < 1000000; tmp++);
00159         }
00160         ADC_DeInit(LPC_ADC);
00161         return 1;
00162 }
00163 
00164 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00165 int main (void)
00166 {
00167         return c_entry();
00168 }
00169 #ifdef  DEBUG
00170 /*******************************************************************************
00171 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00172 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00173 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00174 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00175 * @return               None
00176 *******************************************************************************/
00177 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00178 {
00179         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00180          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00181 
00182         /* Infinite loop */
00183         while(1);
00184 }
00185 #endif

00188  * @}
